meanings.definition: Ficuses: plural form of ficus, a type of plant commonly used as a houseplant.
meanings.sent1: The ficuses in the living room add a touch of green to the space.
meanings.sent2: She bought new ficuses to decorate her apartment.
meanings.sent3: The ficuses in the office have started a secret club.
meanings.sent4: The ficuses in the garden whispered to each other in the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The ficuses swayed gently in the breeze, creating a calming atmosphere.
